articles.author: By Jessie Yeung, Melissa Macaya and Meg Wagner, CNN
articles.title: Coronavirus update: Latest Covid-19 vaccine and US stimulus payments news
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. Meanwhile, vaccinations have already started in some countries as cases continue to rise. Follow here for the latest.
articles.content: US President Joe Biden has pinned Americas hopes of a return to normal on two key dates: May 1, by when he wants all adults to be eligible to get vaccines; and July 4, when he said Americans may be a… [+2329 chars]

articles.title: Joe Biden appeared to channel the 'fireside chat' in his primetime address, says CNN's Kaitlan Collins - CNN Video
articles.description: President Joe Biden addressed the nation on the one-year anniversary since coronavirus shut down much of the US. CNN's Kaitlan Collins shares what she observed from inside the room where Biden spoke.

articles.author: Stephen Culp
articles.title: S&P 500 closes nominally higher amid COVID-19 spikes, muted data
articles.description: The S&P 500 closed nominally higher on Thursday as investors weighed a resurgence in coronavirus infections and the possibility of a new round of shutdowns as well as data that suggested the U.S. economy might not bounce back with quick, V-shaped recovery.
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - The S&P 500 closed nominally higher on Thursday as investors weighed a resurgence in coronavirus infections and the possibility of a new round of shutdowns as well as data th… [+2635 chars]

articles.author: Herbert Lash
articles.title: World stock markets slip on second wave virus fears, safe-havens rise
articles.description: Global stock markets fell on Thursday as a continued rise in the number of coronavirus cases dashed hopes of a swift recovery from the pandemic-induced economic slump and drove demand for safe-haven currencies such as the dollar and Japanese yen.
articles.content: NEW YORK/LONDON (Reuters) - Global stock markets fell on Thursday as a continued rise in the number of coronavirus cases dashed hopes of a swift recovery from the pandemic-induced economic slump and … [+4758 chars]

articles.author: Paul Blest
articles.title: A GOP Lawmaker Tested Positive for Coronavirus and Didn't Bother to Tell His Democratic Colleagues
articles.description: "I never ever, ever knew that the Republican leadership of this state would put so many of us at risk for partisanship to cover up a lie," said one Pennsylvania state House member.
articles.content:
Pennsylvania Democrats are furious after a Republican House lawmaker announced hed tested positive for coronavirus over a week ago but didnt tell them.

articles.author: Roberto Ferdman
articles.title: Coronavirus Took Away a Huge Milestone for First-Generation Graduates: 'I Can't Stop Crying'
articles.description: For them, graduation doesn't just commemorate a personal achievement; it's a collective milestone for the entire family, which they were supposed to celebrate together.
articles.content: The class of 2020 isnt exactly going out with a bang, which is a bummer for the millions of 2020 graduates. But for first-generation graduates, the cosmic injustice is even harder to swallow. For the… [+1318 chars]
